import PantryItemAddBar from "./PantryItemAddBar"; import PantryCategoryHeader from "./PantryCategoryHeader"; import PantryItem from "./PantryItem"; function PantryCategory () { return (
{ enteredItems[0]["items"].map((item) => ( (item.category === cat && cat !== "Saved Items" && item.inStock) ? : (cat === "Saved Items" && !item.inStock) ? < div className="row list-item-bar m-0" title="saved items-section pantry-category" >
: null ))}
); } export default PantryCategory
